result.name: padstow-bay-and-surrounds-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
Three surveys of Padstow Bay and Surrounds rMCZ site have been completed to 
date (Apr 2015):

Cruise: Cefas_cend0113y

Date: 18th January 2013 - 31st January 2013

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP)

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP)

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 48 video transects - Usable

PSA Samples to date: None acquired to date

Infauna Samples to date: None acquired to date

Cruise: EA_sngn0113

Date: 2013

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): None acquired to date

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): None acquired to date

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 65; 1222 stills analysed - Usable

PSA Samples to date: 27

Infauna Samples to date: 27

Cruise: PBSR_CEND1315

Date: 2015-06-14 — 2015-06-27

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): Unknown

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Unknown

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: Unknown

PSA Samples to date: Unknown

Infauna Samples to date: Unknown

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
